description:
AS A FATHER THIS ONE HURT TO THE CORE. This is the reality every BLACK PERSON can overstand.  THAT EVERY TIME WE LIVE YOUR HOUSE ITS A CHANCE YOU COULD GET KILLED.
@mikeupshur
・・・
Listen to the concern of the 2 year old son as his dad goes to bring the trash bins back to the front of the house. ⁣
⁣
Dad: Don’t come outside ⁣
Son: I’m just gonna watch you. ⁣
**Dad proceeds outside to get the trash bins**⁣
Son: Daddy?⁣
Dad: yeah?⁣
Son: ARE YOU GONNA GET SHOT?⁣
Dad: No⁣
Son: Oh! ⁣
⁣
The scary thing is that it’s so common, even a 2 year old comprehends the danger of his dad simply stepping outside the door. ⁣

While the world only has to deal with the CORONAVIRUS. Black people still have to deal with #Racism and #PoliceBrutality. Smh The attack on our people never stops. 
#GeorgeFloyd
#AhmaudArbery
#SeanReed
#BreonaTaylor 
#POPULATIONCONTROL 
#corona  #coronavirus  #Hr6666 #TraceAct #COVID19 #Shutdown #Martiallaw #quarantine  #pandemic #5G #Vaccination ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖
